oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A. V. Bamford Job No. 36391
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Robbins, Marty; James, Sonny;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 951) for an order placed for A. V. Bamford by Billy Deaton for 150 two color window cards for a performance by Marty Robbins and Sonny James at the Beaumont Municipal Auditorium on February 5. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
